biocontainers.name: bioservices
biocontainers.summary: Access to Biological Web Services from Python

biotools.summary: BioServices is a Python package that provides programmatic access to many Bioinformatics Web Services (e.g., UniProt, EUtils, ENA, UniChem, etc) and a framework to easily implement new Web Service wrappers (based on WSDL/SOAP or REST protocols).

bioschemas.name: Bioservices
bioschemas.summary: BioServices is a Python package that provides programmatic access to many Bioinformatics Web Services (e.g., UniProt, EUtils, ENA, UniChem, etc) and a framework to easily implement new Web Service wrappers (based on WSDL/SOAP or REST protocols).
